document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Scarabaeoidea (Insecta: Coleoptera) of the Guianas

Oxyligyrus ( Oxyligyrus ) cayennensis Endr√∂di 1972: 23
( French Guiana ) -
Dupuis 2017b: 86
(syn. nov.)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note 1. According to Dupuis (2017b: 88) , the designation of a neotype of
Chalepus nasutus
by Endr√∂di (1966: 532) is invalid as the holotype has been recovered in the MNHN. Endr√∂di‚Äôs neotype of
C. nasutus
belongs in fact to a new species from southern Brazil ,
Oxyligyrus endroedii Dupuis, 2017
( 2017b: 89 ).

Given the previous, it seems likely that all specimens of
O. nasutus
from Brazil and Paraguay mentioned by Endr√∂di (1966b , 1969a: 29 , 1985a: 240 ) and L√≥pez-Garc√≠a et al. (2016: 500) (who cite Endr√∂di (1985a)) belong to the newly described
O. endroedii
.

The specimens of
O. cayennensis
from Colombia mentioned by L√≥pez-Garc√≠a et al. (2015: 466 , 2016: 500 ) appear to belong, based on the drawings of their genitalia, to the true
O. nasutus
.

Note 2. The record of
Oxyligyrus nasutus
(mentioned as
O. cayennensis
) from Guyana in L√≥pez-Garc√≠a et al. (2016: 500) appears to be erroneous, as they mention their sole data source is existing literature while Guyana is not mentioned in the literature they cite for this species. As far as the research area is concerned, this species is only known from French Guiana .
